text.headline:
Welcome to
My Carreer Timeline
text.text: A brief timeline of my career and projects I undertook during my professional journey.

text.headline:
Data Science Specialist
Tops technologies.
text.text: Worked with wide range of data analytics tools such as PowerBI, SQL, MySQL, Python and it's libraries to develop and present data insights.

text.headline: Site-Energy-Intensity-Prediction-Project
text.text: Developed a machine learning model to predict energy consumption of a site based on various parameters. The project involved data cleaning, feature engineering, model selection, and evaluation.

text.headline: Time-series analysis and forecasting
text.text: Time series analysis is a statistical technique that deals with time series data, or trend analysis. It involves methods for analyzing time series data in order to extract meaningful statistics and other characteristics of the data.

text.headline: Master of Science - MS: Information Science with Specialization in Machine Learning
text.text: Master's degree with specialisation in Machine learning with coursework in data sciences, neural networks, machine learning, applied natural language processing and advanced transformer technologies

text.headline: Project title: Monitoring and Predicting Air Quality Using Machine Learning
text.text: Led the project of 25+ members to develop an air quality prediction project. Helped to analyze the time-series data and data pre-processing for machine learning modelling.Worked on AWS cloud services to collect data from public APIs using the lambda function and store it in S3 buckets.

text.headline: Jr. Machine Learning Engineer
text.text: - Developed Decision Tree model to predict high-risk patients as per project objective. - Performed SMOTE upsampling to reduce imbalance in the dataset. - Developed training and ranking of instances of python scripts at the backend. - K-means clustering grouped younger women and older women in separate groups, Clustering helped to distinguish between younger and older patients. - Merged dataset archived with a Recall of 83%.
